channel.title: Steamworks announced for PS3 with Portal 2
channel.description:
Valve will update it's current titles and perhaps bring new ones with steamworks support for the PS3.... If black mesa will be available through steam would / could it recieve a port to the PS3 using an updated Orange Box Engine?
I think this could make this Mod even more amazing if it was to migrate to consoles too!! And be free hmmmm....costs money to do but is it a possibility?

item.title: Steamworks announced for PS3 with Portal 2
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
You can sorta run steam on qemu but it will not emulate fast enough to play CS 1.6 let alone any Source games.

Read full topic

item.title: Steamworks announced for PS3 with Portal 2
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
The only thing I can see Steamworks bringing to the PS3 is Cloud support, because the PS3 itself has friends and auto-updating.

item.title: Steamworks announced for PS3 with Portal 2
item.dc:creator: DiePoente
item.description:
Nope. No Black Mesa for consoles. I thought steamworks for PS3 actually only includes quick updating and steam cloud to save savegames. No modsupport I guess.
